00046 CACKWindow::CACKWindow():
00047 m_piACKSeqNo(NULL),
00048 m_piACK(NULL),
00049 m_pTimeStamp(NULL),
00050 m_iSize(1024),
00051 m_iHead(0),
00052 m_iTail(0)
00053 {
00054    m_piACKSeqNo = new int32_t[m_iSize];
00055    m_piACK = new int32_t[m_iSize];
00056    m_pTimeStamp = new uint64_t[m_iSize];
00057 
00058    m_piACKSeqNo[0] = -1;
00059 }
00060 
00061 CACKWindow::CACKWindow(const int& size):
00062 m_piACKSeqNo(NULL),
00063 m_piACK(NULL),
00064 m_pTimeStamp(NULL),
00065 m_iSize(size),
00066 m_iHead(0),
00067 m_iTail(0)
00068 {
00069    m_piACKSeqNo = new int32_t[m_iSize];
00070    m_piACK = new int32_t[m_iSize];
00071    m_pTimeStamp = new uint64_t[m_iSize];
00072 
00073    m_piACKSeqNo[0] = -1;
00074 }

00076 CACKWindow::~CACKWindow()
00077 {
00078    delete [] m_piACKSeqNo;
00079    delete [] m_piACK;
00080    delete [] m_pTimeStamp;
00081 }
00082 
00083 void CACKWindow::store(const int32_t& seq, const int32_t& ack)
00084 {
00085    m_piACKSeqNo[m_iHead] = seq;
00086    m_piACK[m_iHead] = ack;
00087    m_pTimeStamp[m_iHead] = CTimer::getTime();
00088 
00089    m_iHead = (m_iHead + 1) % m_iSize;
00090 
00091    // overwrite the oldest ACK since it is not likely to be acknowledged
00092    if (m_iHead == m_iTail)
00093       m_iTail = (m_iTail + 1) % m_iSize;
00094 }
00095 
00096 int CACKWindow::acknowledge(const int32_t& seq, int32_t& ack)
00097 {
00098    if (m_iHead >= m_iTail)
00099    {
00100       // Head has not exceeded the physical boundary of the window
00101 
00102       for (int i = m_iTail, n = m_iHead; i < n; ++ i)
00103          // looking for indentical ACK Seq. No.
00104          if (seq == m_piACKSeqNo[i])
00105          {
00106             // return the Data ACK it carried
00107             ack = m_piACK[i];
00108 
00109             // calculate RTT
00110             int rtt = int(CTimer::getTime() - m_pTimeStamp[i]);
00111             if (i + 1 == m_iHead)
00112             {
00113                m_iTail = m_iHead = 0;
00114                m_piACKSeqNo[0] = -1;
00115             }
00116             else
00117                m_iTail = (i + 1) % m_iSize;
00118 
00119             return rtt;
00120          }
00121 
00122       // Bad input, the ACK node has been overwritten
00123       return -1;
00124    }
00125 
00126    // Head has exceeded the physical window boundary, so it is behind tail
00127    for (int j = m_iTail, n = m_iHead + m_iSize; j < n; ++ j)
00128       // looking for indentical ACK seq. no.
00129       if (seq == m_piACKSeqNo[j % m_iSize])
00130       {
00131          // return Data ACK
00132          j %= m_iSize;
00133          ack = m_piACK[j];
00134 
00135          // calculate RTT
00136          int rtt = int(CTimer::getTime() - m_pTimeStamp[j]);
00137          if (j == m_iHead)
00138          {
00139             m_iTail = m_iHead = 0;
00140             m_piACKSeqNo[0] = -1;
00141          }
00142          else
00143             m_iTail = (j + 1) % m_iSize;
00144 
00145          return rtt;
00146       }
00147 
00148    // bad input, the ACK node has been overwritten
00149    return -1;
00150 }

00154 CPktTimeWindow::CPktTimeWindow():
00155 m_iAWSize(16),
00156 m_piPktWindow(NULL),
00157 m_iPktWindowPtr(0),
00158 m_iPWSize(16),
00159 m_piProbeWindow(NULL),
00160 m_iProbeWindowPtr(0),
00161 m_iLastSentTime(0),
00162 m_iMinPktSndInt(1000000),
00163 m_LastArrTime(),
00164 m_CurrArrTime(),
00165 m_ProbeTime()
00166 {
00167    m_piPktWindow = new int[m_iAWSize];
00168    m_piProbeWindow = new int[m_iPWSize];
00169 
00170    m_LastArrTime = CTimer::getTime();
00171 
00172    for (int i = 0; i < m_iAWSize; ++ i)
00173       m_piPktWindow[i] = 1000000;
00174 
00175    for (int k = 0; k < m_iPWSize; ++ k)
00176       m_piProbeWindow[k] = 1000;
00177 }

00179 CPktTimeWindow::CPktTimeWindow(const int& asize, const int& psize):
00180 m_iAWSize(asize),
00181 m_piPktWindow(NULL),
00182 m_iPktWindowPtr(0),
00183 m_iPWSize(psize),
00184 m_piProbeWindow(NULL),
00185 m_iProbeWindowPtr(0),
00186 m_iLastSentTime(0),
00187 m_iMinPktSndInt(1000000),
00188 m_LastArrTime(),
00189 m_CurrArrTime(),
00190 m_ProbeTime()
00191 {
00192    m_piPktWindow = new int[m_iAWSize];
00193    m_piProbeWindow = new int[m_iPWSize];
00194 
00195    m_LastArrTime = CTimer::getTime();
00196 
00197    for (int i = 0; i < m_iAWSize; ++ i)
00198       m_piPktWindow[i] = 1000000;
00199 
00200    for (int k = 0; k < m_iPWSize; ++ k)
00201       m_piProbeWindow[k] = 1000;
00202 }

00207    delete [] m_piProbeWindow;

00210 int CPktTimeWindow::getMinPktSndInt() const
00211 {
00212    return m_iMinPktSndInt;
00213 }
00214 
00215 int CPktTimeWindow::getPktRcvSpeed() const
00216 {
00217    // sorting
00218    int* pi = m_piPktWindow;
00219    for (int i = 0, n = (m_iAWSize >> 1) + 1; i < n; ++ i)
00220    {
00221       int* pj = pi;
00222       for (int j = i, m = m_iAWSize; j < m; ++ j)
00223       {
00224          if (*pi > *pj)
00225          {
00226             int temp = *pi;
00227             *pi = *pj;
00228             *pj = temp;
00229          }
00230          ++ pj;
00231       }
00232       ++ pi;
00233    }
00234 
00235    // read the median value
00236    int median = (m_piPktWindow[(m_iAWSize >> 1) - 1] + m_piPktWindow[m_iAWSize >> 1]) >> 1;
00237    int count = 0;
00238    int sum = 0;
00239    int upper = median << 3;
00240    int lower = median >> 3;
00241 
00242    // median filtering
00243    int* pk = m_piPktWindow;
00244    for (int k = 0, l = m_iAWSize; k < l; ++ k)
00245    {
00246       if ((*pk < upper) && (*pk > lower))
00247       {
00248          ++ count;
00249          sum += *pk;
00250       }
00251       ++ pk;
00252    }
00253 
00254    // claculate speed, or return 0 if not enough valid value
00255    if (count > (m_iAWSize >> 1))
00256       return (int)ceil(1000000.0 / (sum / count));
00257    else
00258       return 0;
00259 }
00260 
00261 int CPktTimeWindow::getBandwidth() const
00262 {
00263    // sorting
00264    int* pi = m_piProbeWindow;
00265    for (int i = 0, n = (m_iPWSize >> 1) + 1; i < n; ++ i)
00266    {
00267       int* pj = pi;
00268       for (int j = i, m = m_iPWSize; j < m; ++ j)
00269       {
00270          if (*pi > *pj)
00271          {
00272             int temp = *pi;
00273             *pi = *pj;
00274             *pj = temp;
00275          }
00276          ++ pj;
00277       }
00278       ++ pi;
00279    }
00280 
00281    // read the median value
00282    int median = (m_piProbeWindow[(m_iPWSize >> 1) - 1] + m_piProbeWindow[m_iPWSize >> 1]) >> 1;
00283    int count = 1;
00284    int sum = median;
00285    int upper = median << 3;
00286    int lower = median >> 3;
00287 
00288    // median filtering
00289    int* pk = m_piProbeWindow;
00290    for (int k = 0, l = m_iPWSize; k < l; ++ k)
00291    {
00292       if ((*pk < upper) && (*pk > lower))
00293       {
00294          ++ count;
00295          sum += *pk;
00296       }
00297       ++ pk;
00298    }
00299 
00300    return (int)ceil(1000000.0 / (double(sum) / double(count)));
00301 }
00302 
00303 void CPktTimeWindow::onPktSent(const int& currtime)
00304 {
00305    int interval = currtime - m_iLastSentTime;
00306 
00307    if ((interval < m_iMinPktSndInt) && (interval > 0))
00308       m_iMinPktSndInt = interval;
00309 
00310    m_iLastSentTime = currtime;
00311 }
00312 
00313 void CPktTimeWindow::onPktArrival()
00314 {
00315    m_CurrArrTime = CTimer::getTime();
00316 
00317    // record the packet interval between the current and the last one
00318    *(m_piPktWindow + m_iPktWindowPtr) = int(m_CurrArrTime - m_LastArrTime);
00319 
00320    // the window is logically circular
00321    ++ m_iPktWindowPtr;
00322    if (m_iPktWindowPtr == m_iAWSize)
00323       m_iPktWindowPtr = 0;
00324 
00325    // remember last packet arrival time
00326    m_LastArrTime = m_CurrArrTime;
00327 }
00328 
00329 void CPktTimeWindow::probe1Arrival()
00330 {
00331    m_ProbeTime = CTimer::getTime();
00332 }
00333 
00334 void CPktTimeWindow::probe2Arrival()
00335 {
00336    m_CurrArrTime = CTimer::getTime();
00337 
00338    // record the probing packets interval
00339    *(m_piProbeWindow + m_iProbeWindowPtr) = int(m_CurrArrTime - m_ProbeTime);
00340    // the window is logically circular
00341    ++ m_iProbeWindowPtr;
00342    if (m_iProbeWindowPtr == m_iPWSize)
00343       m_iProbeWindowPtr = 0;
00344 }
